name: zk-guess-who
description: ZKU Cohort 3 Final Project - zkGuessWho is an on-chain guess who game.

scripts.install: cd circuits && yarn && cd .. && cd contracts && yarn && cd .. && cd frontend && yarn && cd ..
scripts.test: . scripts/build-circuits.sh && scripts/copy-circuit-contract.sh && cd contracts && npx hardhat test && cd ..
scripts.dev-deploy: cd contracts && yarn dev && yarn deploy

author: elmol
